name: Intuned
headline: Reliably integrate with websites that donât have official APIs
description: Intuned is an AI enabled cloud platform to author, deploy, and monitor integrations to extract web data and execute browser automation. We enable engineers to build reliable integrations to access data and complete actions on other web services when official APIs are not available or complete.

founders.name: Faisal Ilaiwi, Founder
founders.description:
I am a software engineer. I started my career at Microsoft (6.5 years) and then joined UiPath (3.5 years). In UiPath, I had the roles of an Engineering Manager and a Director of Engineering, where I grew my team from 2 to ~20 people within 2.5 years and faced many challenges doing that. We are building Intuned to help ease some of these challenges.

I grow up in Palestine and went to college there; I was then hired to join Microsoft from there.

founders.name: Zawad Chowdhury, Founder
founders.description:
Previously I served as a Platform Product Manager at Microsoft and UiPath. 

Now I'm on a mission to help developers reliably integrate with websites that donât have official APIs.

I enjoy convincing people to do intramurals, spending time with family, reading mangas, and listening to audiobooks.

OUR ADVANTAGE
## Put your data extraction on autopilot with Intuned
OUR ADVANTAGE
### Put your data extraction on autopilot with Intuned
Before Intuned, writing a scraper requires building selectors manually and then updating them whenever the target website changes.
Before Intuned, writing a scraper requires building selectors manually and then updating them whenever the target website changes.
Before Intuned

```
function transformString(input) {
 return input.replace(/ - Amendment #\d+/, '');
}
function transformEffectiveDate(input) {
 return input.replace('Effective Date: ', '');
}
function transformSupplierNumber(input) {
 return input.replace('Supplier Number: ', '');
}
const browser = await chromium.launch({headless: false});
// Create pages, interact with UI elements, assert values
const page = await browser.newPage();
await page.goto("https://demo-site-eta.vercel.app/lists/card");
await page.waitForTimeout(10000);
const listContainerLocator = page.locator(
 "#radix-\:r3\:-content-card > div");
const listItems = await listContainerLocator.locator("div").all();
const contractsList = [];
for (let i = 0; i < listItems.length; i++) {
 const itemLocator = listItems[i];
 const title = await itemLocator.locator("h2").textContent();
 const suppliers = await itemLocator.locator(
  "div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > p:nth-child(1)"
 ).textContent();
 const effectiveDate = await itemLocator.locator(
  "div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > p:nth-child(2)"
 ).textContent();
 const supplierNumber = await itemLocator.locator(
  "div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > p:nth-child(3)"
 ).textContent();
 const status = await itemLocator.locator(
  "div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div"
 ).textContent();
 
 const link = await itemLocator.locator("a").getAttribute("href");
 contractsList.push({
  title: transformString(title),
  suppliers,
  effectiveDate: transformEffectiveDate(effectiveDate),
  supplierNumber: transformSupplierNumber(supplierNumber),
  status,
  link
 });
}
return contractsList;
```

With Intuned [optimized extractors](https://intunedhq.com/<https:/docs.intunedhq.com/docs/data-extraction/overview>), just describe the data you need. Creating selectors, updating them is automated by us. 
With Intuned [Optimized Extractors](https://intunedhq.com/<https:/docs.intunedhq.com/docs/data-extraction/overview>), just describe the data you need. Creating selectors, updating them is automated by us. 
That’s it!

```
await page.goto("https://demo-site-eta.vercel.app/lists/card");
const contractsList = await page.extractArrayOptimized({
 itemEntityName: "contract_info",
 label: "contract_info",
 itemEntitySchema: {
  type: "object",
  properties: {
   title: {
    type: "string", primary: true,
    description:
     "contract title, title should not include Amendment number",
   },
   supplier: {
    type: "string",
    description: "supplier of the contract",
   },
   state: {
    type: "string",
    description: "state of the contract",
   },
   effectiveDate: {
    type: "string",
    description: "effective date",
   },
  },
  required: ["title", "supplier", "state"],
 },
});
return contractsList;
```

That's all

Why intuned
### The only browser automation infra you need

## Put your data extraction on autopilot with Intuned
OUR ADVANTAGE
### Put your data extraction on autopilot with Intuned
Before Intuned, writing a scraper requires building selectors manually and then updating them whenever the target website changes.
Before Intuned, writing a scraper requires building selectors manually and then updating them whenever the target website changes.

```
function transformString(input) {
 return input.replace(/ - Amendment #\d+/, '');
}
function transformEffectiveDate(input) {
 return input.replace('Effective Date: ', '');
}
function transformSupplierNumber(input) {
 return input.replace('Supplier Number: ', '');
}
const browser = await chromium.launch({headless: false});
// Create pages, interact with UI elements, assert values
const page = await browser.newPage();
await page.goto("https://demo-site-eta.vercel.app/lists/card");
await page.waitForTimeout(10000);
const listContainerLocator = page.locator(
 "#radix-\:r3\:-content-card > div");
const listItems = await listContainerLocator.locator("div").all();
const contractsList = [];
for (let i = 0; i < listItems.length; i++) {
 const itemLocator = listItems[i];
 const title = await itemLocator.locator("h2").textContent();
 const suppliers = await itemLocator.locator(
  "div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > p:nth-child(1)"
 ).textContent();
 const effectiveDate = await itemLocator.locator(
  "div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > p:nth-child(2)"
 ).textContent();
 const supplierNumber = await itemLocator.locator(
  "div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > p:nth-child(3)"
 ).textContent();
 const status = await itemLocator.locator(
  "div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div"
 ).textContent();
 
 const link = await itemLocator.locator("a").getAttribute("href");
 contractsList.push({
  title: transformString(title),
  suppliers,
  effectiveDate: transformEffectiveDate(effectiveDate),
  supplierNumber: transformSupplierNumber(supplierNumber),
  status,
  link
 });
}
return contractsList;
```

```
await page.goto("https://demo-site-eta.vercel.app/lists/card");
const contractsList = await page.extractArrayOptimized({
 itemEntityName: "contract_info",
 label: "contract_info",
 itemEntitySchema: {
  type: "object",
  properties: {
   title: {
    type: "string", primary: true,
    description:
     "contract title, title should not include Amendment number",
   },
   supplier: {
    type: "string",
    description: "supplier of the contract",
   },
   state: {
    type: "string",
    description: "state of the contract",
   },
   effectiveDate: {
    type: "string",
    description: "effective date",
   },
  },
  required: ["title", "supplier", "state"],
 },
});
return contractsList;
```

That's all

**Intuned: A Game-Changer in Web Automation**

Founded in 2022 and part of Y Combinator Batch S22, Intuned is an innovative AI-enabled cloud platform located in Kirkland, WA. With a compact but agile team of seven, Intuned is on a mission to integrate with websites that lack official APIs, simplifying the complex landscape of web data extraction and browser automation.

At its core, Intuned serves developers and product teams by allowing them to develop, deploy, and monitor reliable web scrapers and browser automations. What sets it apart is its ability to handle scenarios where traditional APIs fall short. Imagine not having to manually construct selectors—Intuned automates that process. As a developer, you just describe the data you need, and Intuned does the rest, keeping you focused on building instead of breaking.

### Use Cases Across Industries

- **Government Services:** Extract and act on data from government websites at scale.
- **Sales Automation:** Automate social media actions for your users effortlessly.
- **Insurance:** Collect and analyze data for market trends, enhancing investment decisions.

With tools like their Intuned IDE, built-in support for user authentication, and seamless scaling capabilities, the platform positions itself as not just a product, but a robust infrastructure for browser automation.

### Competitive Advantage

Before Intuned, creating scrapers meant constant tweaking and updates. Now? With their optimized extractors, your focus shifts from maintenance to leveraging data—in a simple and straightforward manner.

### Learn More

For developers and teams looking to level up their web scraping and automation processes, Intuned provides an accessible way to get started. You can explore their offerings through [their website](https://intunedhq.com), check out pricing details, or even book a demo to see the magic in action.

**In summary**, Intuned is pushing the envelope in web automation, making it more accessible and manageable for developers everywhere. With AI at play, they are making complex tasks feel effortless, and that’s something worth tuning into.
